#!/bin/bash
# tables.pot is a hand-made pot containing strings from columns with a t modifier
# 	in tables in parseTable calls (e.g, menus, forms, enums)
# templates.pot is another hand-made pot from {{strings}} in SimpleTemplates.
# auto.pot is generated by searching the .php files for _('some string')
xgettext -k_ --from-code utf-8 -o auto.pot --no-wrap ../*.php ../*/*.php
# messages.pot is a concatenation of them
msgcat auto.pot tables.pot templates.pot > messages.pot
# messages_LL.po are initiated with the command
#msginit -l LL -o LL_CC/LC_MESSAGES/messages.po -i messages.pot
# and updated with the command
msgmerge -U pl_PL/LC_MESSAGES/messages.po messages.pot

#edit .po files with e.g. poedit.
# poEdit automatically creates .mo indexes.
